meaningMnemonic: The <radical>cloud</radical> floating above a <radical>demon</radical> has its <kanji>soul</kanji> in it. If you can manage to get through to the demon, to make it see that it doesn't have to be evil, it might remember who it is and return to the <kanji>spirit</kanji> it once was.
readingMnemonic: You shout out and beg its <kanji>soul</kanji> for help until, finally, you see the cloud take the shape of a <reading>con</reading>dor (こん). Aha! "You were a condor before you became a demon! Remember who you are and turn back!"
